mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sys_autocode_detail (id, autocode_id, prefix_code, seq, created_time, modified_time) VALUES (#{id}, #{autocodeId}, #{prefixCode}, #{seq}, #{createdTime}, #{modifiedTime});
mapper.update: UPDATE sys_autocode_detail SET autocode_id = #{autocodeId}, prefix_code = #{prefixCode}, seq = #{seq}, created_time = #{createdTime}, modified_time = #{modifiedTime} WHERE id = #{id};
mapper.select: select * from sys_autocode_detail a where a.autocode_id=#{autocodeId} and a.prefix_code=#{prefixCode}
